Angular User Settings

Easily manage persistent user-specific settings in your AngularJS application.

This is the demo page for angular-user-settings.

Below are 3 user settings. You can click the links to alter their values.

When you reload the page in your browser, the stored settings will be retrieved and applied automatically.

Disable debug mode

{{ $userSetting.get() || 'Default' }}

Note: The settings don't have any affect in this demo. They are just fictive to demonstrate how their value is stored across browser sessions.
